subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Top-seeded Andy Roddick advanced to the final of the Countrywide Classic in Los Angeles with a 6-2, 6-2 victory over Denis Gremelmayr. He will face third-seeded Juan Martin del Potro, who defeated Mardy Fish, 6-2, 6-1.
snippet: Top-seeded Andy Roddick advanced to the final of the Countrywide Classic in Los Angeles with a 6-2, 6-2 victory over Denis Gremelmayr. He will face third-seeded Juan Martin del Potro, who defeated Mardy Fish, 6-2, 6-1.
